mapper.select: select i.item_name, t.execution_price , t.execution_price-d.end_price as change_amount, ROUND((t.execution_price-d.end_price)/d.end_price*100,1) as change_rate, c.public_date from item_time_condition as t, item_code as i, item_day_condition as d, company_info as c where t.item_code = i.item_code and i.item_code = d.item_code and d.item_code = c.item_code and c.public_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 YEAR) and NOW() and (t.item_code, t.closing_time) in ( select item_code, max(closing_time) from item_time_condition group by item_code) and ( d.item_code, d.present) in ( select item_code, max(present) from item_day_condition group by item_code) order by public_date desc LIMIT 10
